Nashua.WSMN: WSMN (1590 AM) is an American radio station broadcasting a news/talk format. Licensed to Nashua, New Hampshire, United States, the station serves the Nashua area. In March 2017, George Russell and Bob Bartis bought WSMN for a "six-figure amount" from previous owner Absolute Broadcasting LLC, promising "more local programming and a refocus on the community." Absolute had featured programing from Talk Radio Network and Westwood One.
